str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To seek after, desire, search for, make inquiries about. From epi and zeteo; to search for; intensively, to demand, to crave.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
In heaven, belonging to heaven, heavenly, from heaven. From ouranos; celestial, i.e. Belonging to or coming from the sky.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To need, have need of, want, desire. From chreia; to make necessity, i.e. Be in want of.
